name: Rotate Origin
description:
Want to rotate an object around an arbitrary point? With Rotate Origin, it is possible!


How to use:

◉ Set the angle of rotation;

◉ Set the offset relative to the upper left corner;

◉ Rotate! ✨


Examples:

  1. Angle: 30; Offset X: 0%; Offset Y: 100% - will rotate the object 30 degrees relative to the lower left corner.
  2. Angle: 45; Offset X: 0; Offset Y: 0 - rotates the object 45 degrees relative to the upper left corner.
  3. Angle: 90; Offset X: 100; Offset Y: -100 - rotates the object 90 degrees relative to a point located 100 degrees to the left and 100 degrees above the top left corner.


◉ Demonstration of work: twitter.com/AndreslavKozlov
